name: openpetra-client-js
description: Client for OpenPetra running in the web browser

scripts.build-debug: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p fonts && cp -f node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css dist && cp -f node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* fonts && browserify -t browserify-css src/index.js -d > dist/bundle.js
scripts.build-min: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p fonts && cp -f node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css dist && cp -f node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* fonts && browserify -t browserify-css src/index.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/bundle.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min

author: Timotheus Pokorra <tp@tbits.net>
